mapper.insert: INSERT INTO board_cafe_comment(num, writer, content, target_id, ref_group, comment_group) VALUES (#{num}, #{writer}, #{content}, #{target_id}, #{ref_group}, #{comment_group})
mapper.select: SELECT num, writer, content, target_id, ref_group, comment_group , to_char(regdate, 'yyyy/mm/dd am hh:mi') as regdate FROM board_cafe_comment WHERE ref_group = #{ref_group} ORDER BY comment_group, num
